The 23-year-old striker becomes Michael Beales third summer signing following the arrivals of Jake Clarke-Salter and Kenneth Paa… [+3134 chars]

articles.title: Trevor Sinclair doesn't expect Christophe Galtier to do any better than Pochettino at PSG - talkSPORT
articles.description: PSG have hired new manager Christophe Galtier after parting ways with Pochettino. Trevor Sinclair and Simon Jordan debate if this is a good move for the Pari...
